requirements.summary: Integrate the standard Usergeek tracking snippet into the HTML entry point and configure it with the provided API key.
acceptanceCriteria: The Usergeek tracking snippet is added to the frontend entry file `frontend/index.html` (e.g., inside `<head>` or immediately before `</body>`), without breaking existing metadata or the `/src/main.tsx` module script tag.
The snippet is configured to use API key `014402022A34A8626A6C124A58B6197F` exactly as provided.
After building and running the app, the browser loads the Usergeek tracking script without console errors attributable to the integration.

file_operations.description: Insert the official Usergeek tracking snippet into the HTML document (preferably within <head> or immediately before </body>) and configure it to use API key `014402022A34A8626A6C124A58B6197F`. Ensure existing metadata/social tags remain intact and do not alter or remove the existing `<script type="module" src="/src/main.tsx"></script>`.
